item.title: Add WebhookBeam service
item.description: https://webhookbeam.com - Set up webhooks and monitor them via push notifications and emails.

item.title: Remove gradient, add Braintrust
item.description: https://www.braintrustdata.com/ - Evals, prompt playground, and data management for Gen AI. Free plan gives upto 1,000 private eval rows/week.

item.title: Add more tools under the Gen AI category
item.description:
https://openpipe.ai - Fully managed fine-tuning for developers. Free plan lets you fine-tune one model with upto 2,000 rows per dataset.
https://gradient.ai/ - - Customize and deploy AI systems from a single platform. Free plan offers fine-tuning on select base models with a token limit of 500.

item.title: Add Portkey's perpetual free tier in a new category "Generative AI"
item.description:
#generative-ai -
https://portkey.ai/ - Control panel for Gen AI apps featuring an observability suite & an AI gateway. Send & log up to 10,000 requests for free every month.
#table-of-contents - Top](#table-of-contents)**

item.title: Added Gitbook to Tools for Teams and Collaboration
item.description: https://www.gitbook.com/ - Platform for capturing and documenting technical knowledge â€” from product docs to internal knowledge bases and APIs. Free plan for individual developers.

item.title: Update README.md
item.description: https://statsig.com - All-in-one platform spanning across analytics, feature flagging, and A/B testing. Free for up to 1m metered events per month.

item.title: New resources
item.description: https://www.360converter.com/) - Free tier useful website to convert: Video to Text && Audio to Text && Speech to Text && Real-time Audio to Text && YouTube Video to Text && add Video Subtitle. Maybe it will be helpful in a short video conversion or in a short youtube tutorial: - Free tier useful website to convert: Video to Text && Audio to Text && Speech to Text && Real-time Audio to Text && YouTube Video to Text && add Video Subtitle. item.title: Added v0.dev to Code Generation section.
item.description: https://v0.dev/ - v0 uses AI models to generate code based on simple text prompts. It generates copy-and-paste friendly React code based on shadcn/ui and Tailwind CSS that people can use in their projects. Each generation takes at minimum 30 credits. You start up with 1200 credits, and get 200 free credits every month.

item.title: Update
item.description: https://templated.io) - Automate your images with a simple API and no-code integrations. Design your template in a Canva-like aditor and render images (.jpg, .png, .webp - Automate your images with a simple API and no-code integrations. Design your template in a Canva-like aditor and render images (.jpg, .png, .webp) and PDFs with code. Free tier plan with 100 credits per month.

item.title: Add Data Dead Drop
item.description: https://datadeaddrop.com - Drop](https://datadeaddrop.com) - Simple, free file sharing. Data self-destroys after access. Upload and download data via the browser or your favorite command line client.
